Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15170645]human papillomavirus(HPV):inhibition of HPV virus-like particle cell entry(86±3% inhibition at 10 μg/ml); inhibition of pseudovirions infection(91±4% inhibition at 10 μg/ml).

Literature.Title: Positively charged synthetic peptides from structural proteins of papillomaviruses abrogate human papillomavirus infectivity.
Literature.Author: Bousarghin L, Touzé A, Yvonnet B, Coursaget P.
